CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 21, 1953, pg. 32, reads: "DECKS GIVE FIRE FAMILY $100 - Kay Jones of the Decks Club is shown presenting a check for $100 from her organization to Carter Johnson and his family who were burned out of their home in Uniontown on Easter Sunday of this year. The mother of the family and four children died in fire which destroyed the home.  The children, left to right, are Charlotte, Carter Jr. little Linda, Mary and Patty.  Money was part of the proceeds from the Deck's Annual Roundup which was held in October of this year. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Kay Jones presenting check to Carter Johnson with Linda Johnson seated between them, and standing from left: Charlotte, Carter Jr., Mary, and Patty Johnson, in domestic interior, another version
